block.p: LaGRECA-Betty. On August 27, 2000, beloved wife of the late Frank, loving mother of Annette and Frank, dear sister of Anthony. Reposing at The Frederick Funeral Home of Flushing, Northern Boulevard at 193rd Street, on Tuesday 7-9:30 P.M., and Wednesday 2-4 and 7-9:30 P.M. Funeral Mass Thursday 9:30 A.M. from Saint Luke's Church, Whitestone, New York. Interment is in Saint Raymond's Cemetery.
